kv3.2:1.3_0: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṁ, satipaṭṭhānaṁ sammappadhānaṁ iddhipādo indriyaṁ balaṁ bojjhaṅgoti?
kv3.2:2.7_0: Ṭhānāṭhānañca manasi karoti, suññatañca manasi karotīti?
kv3.2:3.1_0: Ṭhānāṭhānañca manasi karoti, suññatañca manasi karotīti?
kv3.2:3.3_0: Dvinnaṁ phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotīti?
kv3.2:3.12_0: Ṭhānāṭhānañca manasi karoti, appaṇihitañca manasi karotīti?
kv3.2:4.1_0: Ṭhānāṭhānañca manasi karoti, appaṇihitañca manasi karotīti?
kv3.2:4.3_0: Dvinnaṁ phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotīti?
kv3.2:5.3_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ suññatārammaṇanti?
kv3.2:6.3_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ appaṇihitārammaṇanti?
kv3.2:7.1_0: Sammappadhānā, iddhipādā, indriyā, balā, bojjhaṅgā ariyā suññatārammaṇāti?
kv3.2:7.3_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ suññatārammaṇanti?
kv3.2:8.3_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ appaṇihitārammaṇanti?
kv3.2:9.1_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ na vattabbaṁ—
kv3.2:10.1_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ na vattabbaṁ—
kv3.2:11.1_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyaṁ na vattabbaṁ—
kv3.2:12.1_0: Sattānaṁ cutūpapāte yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyanti?
kv3.2:12.3_0: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ …pe… bojjhaṅgoti?
kv3.2:13.1_0: Sattānaṁ cutūpapāte yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathāgatabalaṁ ariyanti?
kv3.2:13.7_0: Sattānaṁ cutūpapātañca manasi karoti, suññatañca manasi karotīti?

kv3.2:14.3_0: Dvinnaṁ phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotīti?
